disease: Merkel cell carcinoma of unspecified ear and external auricular canal

symptoms.name: Firm, enlarged, elevated lymph node
symptoms.pattern: Indicative of metastasis, observed in one case

symptoms.name: Tumor resembling a wart
symptoms.pattern: Smooth skin surface with enlarged, visible blood vessels

physical_findings: Tumor resembling a wart with smooth skin surface and enlarged, visible blood vessels

required: Histopathological confirmation of Merkel cell carcinoma
